mapper.select: SELECT E.EMP_NO , E.ID , E.PWD , E.NICK , E.PHONE , E.ADDRESS , E.SS_NO , E.HIRE_DATE , E.SALARY , E.STATUS , E.PROFILE_PATH , C.COMP_NAME COMPANY_NAME , D.DEPT_NAME DEPT_NAME , R.RANK_NAME RANK_NAME , E.COMPANY_NO , E.DEPT_NO , E.RANK_NO , C.COMP_ADDRESS COMPANY_ADR FROM EMPLOYEE E JOIN COMPANY C ON C.COMP_NO = E.COMPANY_NO JOIN DEPT D ON D.DEPT_NO = E.DEPT_NO JOIN RANK R ON R.RANK_NO = E.RANK_NO WHERE STATUS='Y' AND E.ID=#{id}

SELECT E.EMP_NO VALUE, E.NICK, E.EMAIL, D.DEPT_NAME, R.RANK_NAME , E.COMPANY_NO , E.DEPT_NO , E.RANK_NO FROM EMPLOYEE E JOIN RANK R ON R.RANK_NO = E.RANK_NO JOIN DEPT D ON D.DEPT_NO = E.DEPT_NO WHERE STATUS='Y'
SELECT DEPT_NO , DEPT_NAME FROM DEPT WHERE COMPANY_NO = #{compNo}
